entry.content: In March 2023 I got the oportunity to do a workshop for autistic adults again. This time it took place at the KULeuven in Belgium. In the first part of the workshop, participants drew along while I introduced the basics of sketchnoting. In the second half of the workshop we drew about our experiences being autistic. I admired the creativity and gave personal feedback during the drawing process. In the end everyone had at least one beautiful drawing to present. Some of the results were featured in the exhibition that started the next day.

entry.content: In 2022 I did a fantastic workshop with autistic adults in Bern for Aspies Deutschschweiz. We learned the basics of sketchnoting and drew visuals about ourselves and our hobbies to get the hang out of it. In the second half of the workshop we got together and planned and realised a poster for an upcoming event of the organisation where non autistic people could ask autistic people questions. It was a very interesting afternoon.
